meanings.definition: A person who posts messages on the social media platform Twitter.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a frequent tweeter on Twitter.
meanings.sent2: Many tweeters share their thoughts and updates online.
meanings.sent3: The tweeter couldn't stop tweeting even during dinner!
meanings.sent4: She was like a chirping tweeter, constantly updating her followers.
meanings.sent5: The enthusiastic tweeter made sure to tweet every hour.

meanings.definition: A speaker in a loudspeaker system that produces high-frequency sounds.
meanings.sent1: The tweeters in the speaker system enhance the music quality.
meanings.sent2: The concert hall had powerful tweeters for clear sound projection.
meanings.sent3: The tweeter in the speaker seemed to be singing along with the music.
meanings.sent4: The tweeter hummed like a tiny bird bringing music to life.
meanings.sent5: The high-pitched tweeter made the music sparkle.
